resources.string: Q. Can I place order on call?
A. Sorry, we do not accept orders on call. however you can call us on +91 9660111869 for any help related to placing order.
Q. How do I know my order is confirmed ?
A. We will send you a order confirmation email once we receive your order.
A. You can do NEFT transfer. We will be sharing the details via email.
Q. What payment modes are accepted?
A. You can pay the cash or cheque at the time of delivery. We will soon be introducing more payment methods.
Q. Will I get an invoice?
A. Yes. You will get an invoice from our suppliers at the time of delivery.
Q. Why is my location is not serviceable?
A. We are currently live only in a few cities. We will be expanding soon.
